name: Easy Navigator
author: ajay

sections.description:
Easy Navigator is plug to navigate through posts easily. It provides very simple and user friendly interface. User can open multiple posts in single window. Not only have that, user can navigated to existing opened posts very fast and very easily. Idea is to design this plug is to provide user friendly and fast way to read more posts or blogs.

Please spend a little time to send feedback to make Easy Navigator better!
sections.installation:
1. Extract easy-navigator.zip in the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to ‘Appearance’ tab and click on ‘widgets’. Remove ‘Recent Posts’ widget if it is exist in active widgets.
  4. Go to ‘My Widget’ and activate widget.
sections.faq:
What is this plug for?

For fast navigations from one post to another. Especially for backward navigation.
